title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with GPU/CPU acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; chat, stream, embeddings, model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package giving LLM, chat, and embeddings interfaces backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user) installable via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama server; chat, generate, pull, and list models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI client for Ollama written in Rust; chat, history, model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official NPM package for JavaScript/TypeScript developers to integrate Ollama models.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package providing Python bindings for Ollama server APIs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub for easy server deployment.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that streams answers from local Ollama models using Bolt framework.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial async Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST API with tokio/hyper.

title: ollama-kit
summary: Official Swift Package Manager library for iOS/macOS apps to chat with Ollama.

title: ollama-rag-langchain
summary: Popular notebook demonstrating local RAG with Ollama embeddings, Chroma, and LangChain.
